name: Ural
short_description: Linear algebra C++ library built upon a tensor class template that can be used to represent tensors of ranks 0 - scalaras, 1 - vectors, 2 - matrices, 3 - tensors of rank 3, etc. It also includes an interface to BLAS and LAPACK subroutines.
